item.name: site_title
item.label: Site title
item.help: Use #page# where page title etc has to appear

item.name: modules
item.label: Modules
item.help: [modules]||Which modules and in what order to load from modules installed to the server||{cms} is always automatically loaded as the first

item.name: landing_page
item.label: Default landing page
item.help: Page to land when empty slug (host domain name only)

item.name: inline_limit
item.label: Css inlining limit
item.help: [css inlining limit]||Google likes when first pageful is inside first 14kB||Approximate amount of css to inline. Use lower numbers for fine tuning and higher for sanity checks||Must have {inline_css} be set and {pack_css} not set in config file

item.name: targets_enabled
item.label: Visitor target groups
item.help: Enable visitor target groups for languages, AB testing, logged in panels etc

item.name: cron_trigger
item.label: Repeating tasks trigger
item.help: [visits] - need to run regularly repeating tasks is checked when users visit||[cron] - when server crontab calls /cms_operations/cron/ (preferred, but not always available)

item.name: not_found_log
item.label: Not found log
item.help: File to log not found requests data. Under cache folder.

item.name: allow_ajax_panels
item.label: Ajax access to any panel
item.help: Enable ajax loading any panel. Usually not secure

item.name: salt
item.label: Salt
item.help: Salt for hash functions. Do not change when you don't know about this.

item.name: allow_api_anywhere
item.label: Allow API anywhere
item.help: Enable API from anywhere. Adds Access-Control-Allow-Origin header to API requests

item.name: language
item.label: Site default language
item.help: Default language for the site

item.label: Layout
item.help: Settings related to site layout

item.name: position_wrappers
item.label: Position wrappers
item.help: {Position wrappers} to be added to layout positions. Eg div named [cms_position_main] around main position.

item.name: position_links
item.label: Position links
item.help: {Position links} - when position wrappers are enabled, in site links will load page positions

item.name: mobile_zoom
item.label: Mobile zoom
item.help: {Mobile zoom} enables pinch zoom for {rem} layout on mobile devices. [Disabled] is ignored by iOS.

item.label: Sizing
item.help: Settings related content size on screen

item.name: rem_px
item.label: Rem max width px
item.help: {Default rems} layout max 100 rems width.||Leave empty when not set

item.name: rem_ratio
item.label: Rem max ratio**
item.help: {Default rems} layout max 100 rems ratio to viewport height.||Leave empty when not set||**(will be removed)

item.name: rem_m_px
item.label: Rem mobile px
item.help: {Default rems} layout breakpoint for mobile size. Rems are twice as big below this viewport width.||Leave empty when not set

item.name: rem_switched
item.label: Desktop rem switched
item.help: {Rem switched} on desktop sizes use width or height for rem calculation

item.name: rem_k
item.label: Rem divider
item.help: {Rem divider} height of 1 rem to viewport size

item.name: rem_m_k
item.label: Rem mobile divider
item.help: {Rem mobile divider} height of 1 rem to mobile viewport size

item.label: Image optimisation
item.help: Settings related to image optimisation

item.name: images_quality
item.label: Image packing quality
item.help: [Image packing quality]||When jpgs are resized or pngs compressed, they are saved in this quality.||If you want to make {Google Page Insights} happy, set it to 85||Otherwise, when there is no problems with page speed, set this to 95.||Webp uses this - 5

item.name: images_1x
item.label: Image 1x desktop modifier
item.help: [Image 1x desktop modifier]||Modifier to template suggested image size for natural pixel size screens

item.name: images_2x
item.label: Image 2x desktop modifier
item.help: [Image 2x desktop modifier]||Modifier to template suggested image size for high density (retina) screens

item.name: images_textarea
item.label: Image in textarea size
item.help: [Image in textarea size]||Images in textareas width to max width pixels||If result is zero or over 1000px, 1000px is used

item.name: images_mobile
item.label: Image mobile modifier
item.help: [Image mobile modifier]||Modifier to template suggested image size for mobile devices

item.label: Metadata and SEO
item.help: Settings related to sharing and search engine metadata

item.name: meta_image
item.label: Image
item.help: Imge to use when page or list item doesn't have meta image defined

item.label: CMS interface
item.help: Settings related to CMS look

item.label: Email
item.help: Settings related to CMS system email

item.name: from_email
item.label: From email
item.help: Do not change, as may go to spam

item.name: email
item.label: Admin email
item.help: Email to send notifications

item.name: smtp_server
item.label: SMTP server
item.help: If empty, php mail is used
